title: FTX’s Sam Bankman-Fried Says He Is Trying to Raise More Money
description: Sam Bankman-Fried told employees that he wanted to reinforce his company’s finances after a collapse that is drawing scrutiny from regulators.
dc:creator: David Yaffe-Bellany, Matthew Goldstein, Lauren Hirsch and Erin Griffith
media:description: Sam Bankman-Fried, the founder of FTX, shared details of his plans in a memo to employees early Thursday.
